summary: Fixed the PIN authentication flow by adding proper state management in app/page.tsx. The onAuthenticated callback now correctly sets the authentication state, allowing users to access the market intelligence tool after entering PIN 3103. Cleaned up debug code and ensured both button click and Enter key work properly.
current_status: PIN authentication fully functional. Users can now enter PIN 3103 and seamlessly access the complete Getnius market intelligence platform. Both Google OAuth and PIN bypass authentication methods are working correctly.
